text1: A smaller version of the Squall, fires the same 180mm high caliber rounds, but at reduced fire rate, smaller magazine depth and more recoil.
Fires a high velocity intermediate shell (130mm) at a modest rate of fire but good accuracy.
Fires a (relatively) small caliber round at a high rate, but is very inaccurate. Best used up close.
The biggest and most powerful cannon to have been developed (yet). Able to rapidly spam 180mm shells at an alarming rate.
